example.name: That Qingqing!
example.text: On the train Mom noticed Qingqing farting and asked Qingqing whether he-1 wanted *PRO*-1 to poo.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Before Mary advised him on the merits of a high-fiber diet, John pood rocks.
